rdfs:label: KL0
ns:common.topic.description: Kernel Language 0 is a sequential logic programming language based on Prolog, used in the ICOT Fifth generation computer project.

ns:common.document.text: Kernel Language 0 (KL0) is a sequential logic programming language based on Prolog, used in the ICOT Fifth generation computer project.\nThis article is based on material taken from the Free On-line Dictionary of Computing prior to 1 November 2008 and incorporated under the \"relicensing\" terms of the GFDL, version 1.3 or later.
